mapper.update:
update medical_history_remark
mhr_start_time = #{mhrStartTime,jdbcType=DATE},
mhr_end_time = #{mhrEndTime,jdbcType=DATE},
mhr_startReason_orName = #{mhrStartreasonOrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mhr_startOrtherReason = #{mhrStartortherreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mhr_endReason = #{mhrEndreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mhr_endOtherReason = #{mhrEndotherreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mhr_remark = #{mhrRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mhr_mark = #{mhrMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
medical_historyId = #{medicalHistoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activityStatus = #{activitystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update medical_history_remark set mhr_start_time = #{mhrStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, mhr_end_time = #{mhrEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, mhr_startReason_orName = #{mhrStartreasonOrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mhr_startOrtherReason = #{mhrStartortherreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mhr_endReason = #{mhrEndreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mhr_endOtherReason = #{mhrEndotherreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mhr_remark = #{mhrRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mhr_mark = #{mhrMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, medical_historyId = #{medicalHistoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activityStatus = #{activitystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

insert into medical_history_remark
id,
mhr_start_time,
mhr_end_time,
mhr_startReason_orName,
mhr_startOrtherReason,
mhr_endReason,
mhr_endOtherReason,
mhr_remark,
mhr_mark,

update_time,
update_user_id,
medical_historyId,
fk_tenant_id,
activityStatus,

#{mhrStartTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{mhrEndTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{mhrStartreasonOrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mhrStartortherreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mhrEndreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT mh.id, mh.fk_patient_diagnosis_id, mh.fk_dialysis_campaign_id, mh.fk_patient_id, mh.has_cva, mh.hemorrhage, mh.heart_defects, mh.has_vascular_disease, mh.has_serious_disease, mh.has_psychosis, mh.other, mh.first_dialysis_date, mh.is_draft, mh.operator_id, mh.version, mh.is_enable, mh.create_time, mh.create_user_id, mh.update_time, mh.update_user_id, mh.fk_tenant_id, mh.first_dialysis_method, mr.mhr_start_time, mr.mhr_end_time, mr.mhr_startReason_orName, mr.mhr_startOrtherReason, mr.mhr_endReason, mr.mhr_endOtherReason, mr.mhr_remark, mr.mhr_mark, mr.activityStatus, mr.medical_historyId FROM medical_history AS mh LEFT JOIN medical_history_remark AS mr ON mh.id = mr.medical_historyId WHERE mh.fk_patient_diagnosis_id=#{fkPatientDiagnosisId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND mr.mhr_mark = #{mhrMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mh.is_enable = 1;
